lender.name: Michael & Carla
lender.loan_because: To bring justice to God's children

lender.name: Agence le Prince Noir
lender.loan_because: Individually we are Kiva lenders and we decided that if our company (run by the two of us!) could afford to pay us a Christmas bonus then it could afford to do something similar for other small businesses

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: Every little bit helps. It amazes me that something that impacts my life at such a small scale, can do wonders for someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I am a full-time student in college and I have a part-time job at the school as well.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: Many people helped me to create my own business and now I want to give back. I especially enjoy helping others in my own industry
lender.occupational_info: I am a freelance hair stylist living in New York City but travel a lot for my clients.

lender.name: Gillian
lender.loan_because: my 2 boys raise money by recycling bottles and cans, fundraising and more through their "Michael Recycle and Bro." charity. I encouraged them to support KIVA.
lender.occupational_info: we want to ~ be the change we want to see in the world.

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: It is important to me

lender.name: Deepak Bharathan
lender.loan_because: It's easy. It works. And it totally rocks!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a management consultant obsessed with creating smart outcomes. Outside cubicles and conference rooms, I am passionate about a diverse portfolio of things which include environment, education, arts and non-profit ventures.

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world where a difference needs to be made. I feel that lending teaches the lendee a much more valuable lesson than does just giving money away.
lender.occupational_info: Currently, I'm furthering my education and will be a high school teacher in 2 1/2 years!

lender.name: Maureen
lender.loan_because: I have been very lucky to be self employed for four years so that I can spend time with my son. I know how challenging it is to get started and make ends meet and am so happy to help other single moms meet their dreams by having their own business and raising their children.
lender.occupational_info: I help people find hotels for meetings and conventions.

lender.name: Deirdre
lender.loan_because: A good friend JFZ introduced me to the site by getting me going with my first loan amount and I think this is such a wonderful way I can help those in need.
lender.occupational_info: I answer the phones and transfer calls to the appropriate departments. I am also in charge of keeping our accounting system in order. Making payments, collections, etc.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: God has been very good to me and my family. To be afforded the opportunity to make a friend all the way across the world is very special to me.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I want to help empower women to become independent

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: People benefit from a "hand up"
lender.occupational_info: I arrange financing for diverse needs

lender.name: Regina
lender.loan_because: It is good for my soul to help others. We all came from the same source, why wouldn't we help one another?
lender.occupational_info: I do not have a permanent job outside the home. I have two small children that I am raising. In my spare time, I volunteer and from time to time I work some part-time jobs.

lender.name: Jonas
lender.loan_because: It is a good way to improve the world and it is much more efficient than a lot of other organisations.

lender.name: Mahva
lender.loan_because: I intend to help as much as I can. I believe that the abundance in this world is meant for all of us. Those fortunate enough to see that abundance in their lives right now must remember that just as the Divine has given to us, so we must also give to our brothers and sisters in this world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a secretary by day, baker by night.

lender.name: Lynda
lender.loan_because: I am very blessed to be able to live the life that I do. Although I am not well-off by any stretch of the imagination, I have a nice home, all the food I can eat, clean water to drink, a wonderful family, good health, and loving friends. So many others are not as fortunate. I loan because I feel an obligation to "pay it forward."
lender.occupational_info: I work from home processing online sports related subscriptions and answering customer questions via the internet.

lender.name: Heathers Team
lender.loan_because: We can - and because of an inspirational person who was part of our lives

lender.name: Lorraine
lender.loan_because: I want to help people get out od poverty

lender.name: Danny
lender.loan_because: I would like to help the world become a better place, and you know; what goes around comes around. But I'm NOT donating just so good karma comes back to me. I just want to help the world.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school, play music, play sports, and have fun!

lender.name: Caron
lender.loan_because: I would like to contribute to someone who would benefit from this small gesture
lender.occupational_info: I practice: Aromatherapy/Massage Therapy and currently a student Teacher Trainer of Hatha Yoga

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference no matter how big or small

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: It is one small way to help others that are trying to better their own lives.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I want to know where my contribution is going. I do not want to give to an organization that says they "may" use my money for the item I am sponsoring. I would rather loan it to someone that will use it for something I approve of at the time of my donation.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that makes blast and bullet resistant glass and armor. We are in business to save lives. It makes me proud to work for a company that has such a profound impact.

lender.name: Sherri
lender.loan_because: I have such a wonderful opportunity to do so in the high hopes it will help other people.
lender.occupational_info: My work involves educating myself so that I may be of value to others in some way, shape, or form.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: This is just a great way to make a difference in the life of someone who really wants to make an honest living but needs some outside help to get started and/or grow.
lender.occupational_info: Software Engineer, investor, and stay at home Dad.

lender.name: john
lender.loan_because: Anybody who is willing to work hard to better their situation deserves a chance to do so.
lender.occupational_info: Restoration

lender.name: chantel
lender.loan_because: I want to help other women be independent and successful.
lender.occupational_info: teaching is the greatest job in the world and I love being with my students and colleagues.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I loan because I am very fortunate and wish to assist others in bettering their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I help clients plan to pay their state and federal taxes and also complete the tax return paperwork required.

lender.name: Rondi
lender.loan_because: I'm doing my part to improve the world one microloan at a time!

lender.name: Dianne
lender.loan_because: it is my obligation.
lender.occupational_info: I am just one woman trying to help other women.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: perhaps in some way, I can make a small difference in someone else's life. Giving to kiva is not a handout, but an opportunity for a motivated, hardworking individual who wouldn't have gotten it through ordinary means. They are best suited to figure out how to spend it and I wish them every bit of success in their communities!
lender.occupational_info: My job is the same as every accountant's in the world: I keep track of the cash we earn, spend and keep. Every month, I tell my bosses how we're performing.

lender.name: MaryBeth
lender.loan_because: I want to help others in our global community
lender.occupational_info: I'm trying to reduce greenhouse gas emissions that lead to climate change

lender.name: Betsy
lender.loan_because: helping someone help themselves improves everyone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I record people and mix the audio with music to create commercials that go on radio stations.

lender.name: Maria-Isabel
lender.loan_because: I am happy to help people who want to progress.
lender.occupational_info: For the past 10 years, I have been working on developing projects aiming to reduce carbon emissions in the atmosphere (combating climate change).

lender.name: Meredith
lender.loan_because: I want to see motivated small businesses succeed, and families and communities prosper.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mental health counselor for children and parents. I try to help children who are suffering from stress, trauma, and abuse, and to help parents nurture their children more effectively.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: $25.00 is a small amount to give to make a life-changing impact for someone who is trying to start their own business.
lender.occupational_info: I have worked in the town's public library for 23 years. Getting the materials that we receive (books, dvds) ready for check-out is my ( and my co-worker's) main priority. These materials may be borrowed for free for a period of time.

lender.name: Pam
lender.loan_because: It's fun and the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I write adventure novels for teens.

lender.name: Gary and Patty
lender.loan_because: financial independence is a means to happiness, education, social mobility...
lender.occupational_info: I write screenplays for television shows, TV movies and feature films

lender.name: Lesley
lender.loan_because: Its better to Give than to RECEIVE.....

lender.name: Krista, Joe & Jackson
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: seeking gratitude and satisfaction; love and peace.

lender.name: Csilla
lender.loan_because: I believe that if just one person in the world who is economically stable gives a small donation or loan to another individual who is low-income or very poor can reduce suffering in the world.

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do. We are all in this together and are our brother's keeper.
lender.occupational_info: my work has allowed me to empower others to see possibilities when they believe there are none.

lender.name: Int'l H.S. students
lender.loan_because: The younger generation is here to make a difference!

lender.name: Patricia n Mark
lender.loan_because: God says Kiva has more returns than the stock market!
lender.occupational_info: Mark oversees the building of stores in malls. Patricia paints and illustrates children's books.

lender.name: vickie
lender.loan_because: I'M A TAX FREE ORG , FROM DONATION AND FROM CHRISTIANDAYCARE NEED AND DCHRISTIAN DATING SERVICE
lender.occupational_info: HONEYOFBLESSING IS CHRISTIAN WORKING TO HELP,PEOPLE IN NEED FOR FREE CREDIT PROBLEM AND SOME TAX PROBLEM ,A 24 DAYCARE YOU HAVE TO PAY AND CHRISTIAN DATING SERVICE , WE HAVE FOODBANKS FOOD THE POOR, CLOTHE AND HELP WITH MONEY PROBLEM SHOWING THEM HOW TO GET ON TRACK OF THING , HOME BUSINESS JOBS AND OTHER

lender.name: Heidi
lender.loan_because: I'm grateful for the good life I have, so I want to help others have more productive, happy lives also.
lender.occupational_info: I paint glassware & other products to sell to shops in the USA. I employ local women to help me make these things. I also tend chickens, ducks & a big garden for food at my home.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: creating real hope and progress is important to me.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I am following my heart.
lender.occupational_info: I work with young children.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I love the concept of microlending!
lender.occupational_info: I manage the finances for our business...I pay the bills and collect the money owed

lender.name: cheri
lender.loan_because: We all need a little help now and then.

lender.name: GPS Client Fund
lender.loan_because: I setup this ongoing fund in appreciation of my clients.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies use technology to improve their businesses.

lender.name: Rudy
lender.loan_because: It is a tribute to the clients of my company, VIP Property Management.
lender.occupational_info: Real Estate services. Management. Sales and Consultation

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: Living in the greatest country on the planet. For this honor, I try and repay with kindness and understanding for those less fortunate
lender.occupational_info: biker, father, lover of life and laughter

lender.name: Janice
lender.loan_because: I find their stories amazing! These are very hard working people who are just trying to make a living and support their family. Our donations are a way to help them out of poverty. We have so much here in the States, and they have so little. A little goes a long way for them, and it is the least we can do to help them succeed in life.
lender.occupational_info: I manage multi family community associations (i.e. condominium/townhome associations, single family associations, commercial properties). I manage the maintenance of both the buildings and the property.

lender.name: Tete a Pratt
lender.loan_because: We are a group of employees from Pratt & Whitney Canada that completed a Negotian Solutions Seminar with the Mattford Group. We chose Kiva as an opportunity to help others and to keep the legacy of our Seminar family alive.
lender.occupational_info: Aerospace Manufacturing - we build airplane engines

lender.name: HelpHer
lender.loan_because: The HelpHer Giving Circle is a group of women who come together monthly and pool our monies, both individually committed dollars and our fundraising contributions. We are especially sensitive to help when community resources/services are unable to meet women's needs. We give anonymously, quickly, and with no strings attached.
lender.occupational_info: Monies collected within the HelpHer Giving Circle are designated for three areas of giving: women within the metro area of Nebraska/Iowa, international women through Kiva.org, and emergency funds for basic needs and legal services.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I believe in Free Enterprise and this is a way to empower others to experience success in their personal enterprise.
lender.occupational_info: I am an Executive Director, Real Estate Investor, and Entrepreneur with several successful companies.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: This is a hand reaching globally to another hand and I like that.
lender.occupational_info: Settle labor agreements disputes between employers and unionized workers.

lender.name: Pam and Josie
lender.loan_because: I like to help people who are trying to make their lives better. Goes around, comes around.
lender.occupational_info: I used to work helping abused women and children. I learned so much from them.

lender.name: Glenn & Marci
lender.loan_because: It is a great opportunity to give back in a very innovative way and learn about others all over the world struggling to be positive entrepreneurs in their own communities.
lender.occupational_info: I am a full time parent, a part-time bus driver and occasional mediator (helping disputing people work out their conflicts).

lender.name: Dale
lender.loan_because: It's a small way to make a large difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: Teaching people how to be more effective in the way they teach or train someone to do a new job or task. Communication skills, complete listening, learning styles and effective methods for delivering information.

lender.name: Nagelmann
lender.occupation: Variety including nurse, business owners, etc.
lender.loan_because: We are a family who decided to spend our Christmas present budget on loans for others.

lender.name: Gerri
lender.occupational_info: I teach Transcendental Meditation, and I sell residential homes

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to give and I want to teach my children the value of helping others

lender.name: Robel Yemiru
lender.loan_because: I'm in a position to help.

lender.name: Familia Garcia Galindo
lender.loan_because: We want our money to be useful to other people

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I couldn't sleep at night if I didn't

lender.name: Lana
lender.loan_because: Nothing feels better than helping people that want to help themselves. Carpe Diem
lender.occupational_info: I work with kids ages 15-19 as a high school counselor. I support them in their journey from adolescence to adulthood.

lender.name: mary
lender.loan_because: I want to help you with your business . You work hard and have a vision of what you want to do, and I want to help you realize that.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the San Diego Police Department as a Police Radio Dispatcher. I talk to the police officers on the radio, assign them calls, and help them when necessary.

lender.name: William & Sachiyo
lender.loan_because: To allow others in the world to become self sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: Dentistry for the under served.

lender.name: Saran S.
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who want to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Computer related

lender.name: J Richard
lender.loan_because: I want to stimulate business in Africa and help people.
lender.occupational_info: I run a software company.

lender.name: Patti
lender.loan_because: I can not do all the world needs But the world needs all I can do

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: Seeing this site inspired me to loan, I'm just getting started, but will try and help someone every time I get paid. It makes me happy to see so many people trying to make a difference, what an amazing concept.
lender.occupational_info: Marketing, advertising and branding for a number of clients from spirits companies, automotive brands, technology and healthcare. Just trying to keep our work positive.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I was a Peace Corps volunteer in Azerbaijan. I saw the use and influence of microcredit on small business owners and farmers. I know how much they need it and deserve financial help all across the world.

lender.name: Gina
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the lives of others and help those less fortunate than myself.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I want to help those "out there" in the world get on their feet and live more productive, less fear-filled and desperate lives.
lender.occupational_info: As a social worker, I helped adults, children and families solve their relationship and mental health problems. I helped them to believe in themselves.

lender.name: andrea
lender.loan_because: I have learned being disabled has made me slow down and see life differently

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I want to help others help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I'm in the financing business.

lender.name: Morgan and Kate
lender.loan_because: Because we can.
lender.occupational_info: Morgan makes maps and Kate teaches children.

lender.name: Preet
lender.loan_because: giving is better than receiving
lender.occupational_info: Work means less to me than helping people

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am the resident manager of Thorne Swift Nature Preserve on Lake Michigan's Little Travers Bay, along with making and selling bows and arrows in the off season.

lender.name: Troy
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: A walk in the park compared to most.

lender.name: Gary
lender.occupational_info: I make sure students do what they are expected to do.

lender.name: Kurt
lender.loan_because: I believe in Micro Finance
lender.occupational_info: I manage people's investments

lender.name: kathryn
lender.loan_because: your ideas and goals matter to your families and communities and i believe you will be successful.
lender.occupational_info: i evaluate health services.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: America is the land of excess and I want my children to understand that they are very lucky to live here and have what they do. I want them to see that anyone can make a difference with a little effort.
lender.occupational_info: I am able to stay at home and raise my children. My husband is a General Manager for a major golf course and I wait tables part-time at a restaurant in Boston.

lender.name: Tony
lender.loan_because: it's the best investment I could possibly make! "Be the change you wish you to see in the world"
lender.occupational_info: Student and NGO Worker. I study how NGOs (like Kiva) operate and work for a foundation that invests in arts NGOs in the mid-west.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: I want to help others to better their lives.

lender.name: Felicia
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping those who need a hand, not a hand out, especially to those who live in the developing countries where many many hands are needed. This is my small way of serving others. As a wise man once said, "the greatest is the one who serves." Aloha!
lender.occupational_info: My work is to do what ever humanly possible to rid myself of all malice and all deceit, hypocrisy, envy, and slander of every kind. I believe that true justice is mercy and compassion.

lender.name: Raegan
lender.loan_because: It's the least I can do!

lender.name: Amir
lender.loan_because: I am a small business owner and know how difficult it is to attract financing in U.S. I can understand how much more difficult it is for someone in the 3rd world (I was born in one) to do the same thing.
lender.occupational_info: Composer and music educator

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I want to give back to people and communities in need. I have no doubt the money will make a much greater impact in small communities with minimal resources.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the United Kingdom to help oversee various implementation projects across my company's businesses in Europe.

lender.name: John W
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I make maps.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I think we can all make a difference.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: We are all one family helping each other out.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I will be joining the Peace Corps next March and then headed to grad school.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: These people don't want a hand out, they want to make a difference.

lender.name: Sue & Bill
lender.loan_because: It's a GREAT way to help someone in need!
lender.occupational_info: I am the owner of AGI Solutions Inc. It is a Internet based Silkscreen & Flexo Printing Mfg.

lender.name: Katy
lender.loan_because: it is a awesome way to help strengthen businesses that benefit many people all over the world!

lender.name: Allen
lender.loan_because: It reflects my values.

lender.name: Debra, Jaz & Raj
lender.loan_because: .........because we have been given the ability to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Heal and rejuvenate people through massage and generate electricity to make our lives easier.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I know how important it is to have the resources needed to start or grow a business.

lender.name: Norton Aid
lender.occupational_info: We protect more people from more online threats than anyone in the world

lender.name: Eric and Elena
lender.loan_because: it feels goooood... =)

lender.name: Carla
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to live in a country where my daughter has every opportunity available to her. Not everyone does, and this is something small we can do to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work with children in the school system to be more successful in the classroom environment.

lender.name: Angie and Abby
lender.loan_because: We have $25 and some people don't. What more reason do we need?
lender.occupational_info: Angie works with teenage girls with troubled pasts. To help them survive better in the world. Abby is a student.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: How could I not take a small risk on someone willing to work hard to make a better life.

lender.name: Charlie
lender.loan_because: I like to help other people who are in need.

lender.name: Sylvia
lender.loan_because: I loan because it makes the world a smaller place. Also, microfinancing helps me to keep the pace of life here in perspective.

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: I want to share the goodness I've received.

lender.name: Josh, Maxine & Noah
lender.loan_because: We want our family to help others succeed.

lender.name: Jan Schroeder
lender.loan_because: I believe strongly in the principle of Pay It Forward. Blessings that come into my life are paid forward to benefit others. It's the right thing to do; it's the human thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I'm the Supervisor of Document Control for Babcock & Wilcox Nuclear Energy, Inc.

lender.name: Blake
lender.loan_because: I believe we can all make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I introduce programs to local governments that benefit their cities and residents.

lender.name: Matt Parkins
lender.loan_because: I'm passionate about micro-financing people out of poverty!
lender.occupational_info: Codnig apps, games and websites.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I want people to have the power to make a good life for themselves.

lender.name: Greg & Julie
lender.loan_because: we can and believe in the spirit of Rachel Beckwith that we each can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: We teach the future. We have an opportunity to open the eyes of young students to the needs of those in other parts of the world and have them compare it to their own life experience. We hope to make the world a better place by planting the seeds in the minds and hearts of our future.

lender.name: DJV
lender.loan_because: I understand and appreciate the hard work in building a business. I want to help other entrepreneurs who are not as lucky as I have been so far.
lender.occupational_info: Internet marketing entrepreneur

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: I want to help! :o)

lender.name: Kristen
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs help at one or more times in their lives. I've been fortunate to have help when I needed it, so I'm happy to help others when I can.
lender.occupational_info: Essentially I make sure that people are happy in their apartments and that all of their needs are met.

lender.name: Katy
lender.loan_because: Microfinance is a revolutionary concept that offers a tangible solution to eliminating, or at least drastically reducing world poverty. Kiva.org allows me a means with which to loan, a possibility I previously did not know how to implement; knowing about the grandeurs of microfinance is one thing, but being able to actually take advantage of its' genius is quite another. So for that, thank you!!!

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: I made a loan in my mother and mother-in-laws names. When the loans are paid back I will reinvest the money in 2 more woman. This way, the lives of the 2 women who were so important in my life will go on forever helping other women around the world.

lender.name: Mark & Jenn Gonnelly
lender.loan_because: We are so fortunate in our life, that we would be truly selfish if we didn't share with others.

lender.name: Kelley
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do. We all need to make our lives better and if I can help...I will do so.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a home maker. Our family is involved in the Food and Beverage industry.

lender.name: Kristi
lender.loan_because: I want to give someone the opportunity to create a better life, a sense of self-worth, confidence and accomplishment. I want them to be able to live a more comfortable life and to be able to dream of the future. This is more than a loan, this is the opportunity to change lives, one by one.

lender.name: Carlton
lender.loan_because: I want to helpful.
lender.occupational_info: Before retiring I was responsible for putting together people places and things to make justice happen.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves the chance to get out of poverty if they do the work necessary.
lender.occupational_info: I make educated guesses about the future direction of prices of stocks.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I believe in people.
lender.occupational_info: I work with tools that make measurements for oil and gas wells while they are being drilled.

lender.name: David J. Bianco
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: People all over the world, in all walks of life, should have just and fair access to credit.
lender.occupational_info: I am a partner in a small business.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: we are able to

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: Kiva provides such an amazing opportunity to feel connected with the global community and do good things

lender.name: St. Mary's
lender.loan_because: we represent St. Mary's commitment to social justice and support of the UN Millenium Development Goals.
lender.occupational_info: We are members of St. Mary's Episcopal Church located in St. Paul, Minnesota.

lender.name: Evelyn
lender.loan_because: I hope that I can make a small difference at the grass roots level.

lender.name: Vicky & Jonathan
lender.loan_because: Shouldn't everyone have the opportunity to improve their life regardless of where they find themselves due to birth?

lender.name: tom & deborah
lender.loan_because: what the world needs is a different kind of action hero

lender.name: leon
lender.loan_because: I care!!! I want the chain to continue...I am small alone but as a chain we can make a difference!
lender.occupational_info: I run a clothing store.

lender.name: Mitch & Kelley
lender.loan_because: We succeeded because someone took a chance on us. Things were tough at first but through hard work and perseverance we have built a successful business and we have opened our second location. I like to lend to others trying to succeed in food service like me because I know first hand just how hard it is to move up in this business without a little help.
lender.occupational_info: I own & manage two sandwich shops and my wife is an emergency trauma nurse in the ER of a hospital. I bake the bread & meats, slice and cook every sandwich fresh to order. Other duties include maintaining the books, insurance, and overseeing our employees just to name a few things. My wife helps those who are severly injured and brought to the emergency room.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: it is so gratifying to see a small contribution make a significant difference in someone else's life.

lender.name: Shiloh
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate and blessed-I have the means to assist- I like the sustainability angle of the program and believe in those who have a plan to better their families lives.
lender.occupational_info: College Student- looking to enter a acedemically challenging college in 2008! :) Accepted and excited to be attending Hollins University in Roanoke, VA:) Looking to graduate in 2012 and attend grad school/law school-on target

lender.name: Holly Ann
lender.loan_because: sometimes others can do more with my dollar than i can.
lender.occupational_info: loving children, reading books

lender.name: steve
lender.loan_because: Because I can.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: I believe - Help is for people who want it - Not people who need it - work hard think positive and good things will happen

lender.name: Lorraine
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves & has potential to make something of themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I will be a college graduate in May. Then in September, I will be starting graduate school at NYU for my masters in Elementary & Special Education.

lender.name: Mr. Wiley
lender.loan_because: I want to help people
lender.occupational_info: I drive semi trucks in america.

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: I love assisting in empowering impoverished people around the world to reach their goals and change their lives.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do. No one should go to bed hungry or cold.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a university, and do volunteer work in my home community.

lender.name: Ilan
lender.loan_because: I enjoy doing it.
lender.occupational_info: I develop technology that help companies manage their Online Marketing efforts more effectively. We deliver greater Return on investment for your Marketing Dollar.

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: I love being able to help others when I have been blessed with so much.
lender.occupational_info: Civil enginner turned stay at home mom.

lender.name: The Glazov's
lender.loan_because: we don't like the idea of debt slavery!

lender.name: Tim and Rebecca
lender.loan_because: It seems like a good way to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Tim works for the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency. Rebecca volunteers at our kids' school.

lender.name: Taylor & Rob
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do. We have been so blessed, we just wish to give back & this is truly a wonderful way of doing it.

lender.name: yigal
lender.loan_because: It seems like a good thing to do. Anytime you can promote goodness in a world that desperately needs it you've taken a step forward for humanity.
lender.occupational_info: Musician

lender.name: Courtney
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference!
lender.occupational_info: I am a 4th grade teacher in Northern Canada.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: I am learning about MNC's and the unbound debt that can result due to mistakes made on our (industrialized countries) part in the past. As a result of the said "race to the bottom", I feel the need to do something to change the current conditions in the world. I know that one by one is the only way to change the world now. So it's high time I contribute!
lender.occupational_info: I am a full time student at a northern Washington university who is working toward a degree in communications and political science. I am aspiring to join a non-governmental organization such as Oxfam and to help the world as best I can.

lender.name: Niki
lender.loan_because: I have my own small business and know how hard it can be to get started or make upgrades. I love the idea of helping someone else in the same position I was or could be in the future.
lender.occupational_info: I have a private massage therapy practice where I help my clients deal with stress,pain management, injury prevention and recovery. I am also going to school to complete prerequisites for medical school.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people be productive and believe in generating good karma.
lender.occupational_info: I help people fix their technology problems.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. Used to be "Think globally, Act locally", now it's "Think globally, Act globally." Thanks Kiva!
lender.occupational_info: Your worth is measured by how much you help others

lender.name: Adriana
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me with so many blessings in my life I want to do the same for others.

lender.name: High School Friends
lender.loan_because: We decided to make a loan this year, in lieu of purchasing Christmas gifts for each other this holiday season.
lender.occupational_info: We have all known each other and been girlfriends for over 22 years. Some of us are / have been entrepreneurs and would like to support other entrepreneurs in developing countries

lender.name: The Super Team
lender.loan_because: We would like to help eliminate poverty and help people.

lender.name: Jeff Hardwick
lender.loan_because: It makes sense to set an example for the rest of the developed world.
lender.occupational_info: Not to feed others, but to help them to catch their own fish.

lender.name: Mattness
lender.loan_because: The greatest achievement is selflessness.The greatest quality is seeking to serve others.
lender.occupational_info: The greatest magic is transmuting the passions.

lender.name: lealani
lender.loan_because: I feel it is good to help others, hoping they will try to do the same. I believe that if you help other people they will see the good and do the same.
lender.occupational_info: I like to draw, paint, etc.

lender.name: Allan
lender.loan_because: I founded my own company and know that it takes both hard work and support to make it work, but the rewards are worth it.
lender.occupational_info: I help individuals and companies build businesses.

lender.name: Pedro
lender.loan_because: Sometimes we all need a push in the right direction. I believe in people and their ability to grow.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computer software.

lender.name: Theresa
lender.loan_because: I'm still young and yet I have every chance in this world for success in life. There are so many people out there without that opprotunity. It's unfair that I should be so blessed.
lender.occupational_info: Right now I'm taking a year off after high school to save some money for my post-secondary education. I work as a cook in an English Pub.

lender.name: Sarah Mae
lender.loan_because: it seems like such a fantastic way to connect with others around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work with children to teach them to speak.

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: a girl I like told me I should. And because helping people is good.

lender.name: Anders
lender.loan_because: I want to help people, that want to start or develope their own buisiness, so that they can have an interesting future, and improve their and theirs families life quality!
lender.occupational_info: I have been working in my own buisiness, (industrial equipment) for many years, and I am now reaping the good result of it!!

lender.name: Rosie
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to do so. I am happy to help foster entrepreneurship rather than just 'giving'. In this small way, I hope I am helping to create a better world for all of us.

lender.name: Milo
lender.loan_because: I think it is one of the best ways to make higher living standards in afrika and other poor areas - So if YOU read this then please do lend some of your money to people who are in great need.
lender.occupational_info: I create 3D industrial product models in a sales configurator.

lender.name: Michael
lender.occupational_info: Chief Operating Officer, World Bicycle Relief

lender.name: Malcolm & Lauren
lender.loan_because: We can help peole who are trying to help themselves
lender.occupational_info: Ship Agents help the smooth passage of ships and crews into and out of ports. Particular attention is paid to crews needs

lender.name: Jun Bucao
lender.loan_because: I feel good giving or helping others and for my children to learn to give or help others always.

lender.name: Gabriel
lender.loan_because: I wish to help fight fight poverty and bring greater equity to the world in order to empower those who would otherwise be unable to work towards their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I study the development of the nervous system.

lender.name: Heinz-Jürgen
lender.loan_because: it´s not a problem for me.

lender.name: Vanessa
lender.loan_because: I am so happy that we can! We all need to be global citizens!

lender.name: Jay & Matt
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. We are all humans and helping each other makes my heart sing.
lender.occupational_info: We are both theatrical stage managers. We live in NYC and work all around the world manageing broadway musicals.

lender.name: Randy
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference and it is God's wish.
lender.occupational_info: Rewarding, enriching, and challenging

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: We have always believed in the spirit of the entrepreneur.
lender.occupational_info: We help local business owners get their message online, heard and understood throughout the world.

lender.name: Eric & Christine
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: Kiva seems like a good way to help out individual people instead of sending it into a vague pool of money where it might or might not get to the people you want it to go to. I really like this concept and you can follow the progress of the people you help out and if successful really makes everyone feel like they've accomplished something. Not many things in life do that.

lender.name: Wayne
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people.

lender.name: jeanene
lender.loan_because: My friends and I have been blessed. We are all mothers and daughters who understand the desire of a better life for our families. This is my 50th birthday gift from my friends.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student again at 50. I have gone back to school to get a Masters Degree to help people.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I love the idea that these hard working people are not asking for a handout, but rather a helping hand. Thanks Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I sell annuities to financial professionals in the United States. Annuities are insurance products that provide people guaranteed income in their retirement years.

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: I want to help others have a better life
lender.occupational_info: I work as a nurse in our local hospital. I am a mother of two military sons who are both married and I have a great husband.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: It's a nice feeling to be able to make such a big difference with even small loans, and to feel connected with people on the other parts of the globe.
lender.occupational_info: I raise awareness and support for important issues and causes.

lender.name: Jim and Deb
lender.loan_because: It feels good.
lender.occupational_info: Banker (Jim) and Director of Operations (Deb)

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I am lucky enough to be able to give. I am very grateful for the abundance I have in my life. Not everybody has the access to food, shelter, clothing, and education that I have. I hope my loans help others to exceed where they could not before. Best of luck and lots of love!
lender.occupational_info: I am currently teaching conversational English in Japan.

lender.name: Team D
lender.loan_because: We loan because we want to help entrepreneurs achieve their goals of starting or expanding their businesses. We really believe in the concept of micro-lending and wanted to support it. This idea started as part of a group project for one of our classes.
lender.occupational_info: Our team - comprised of 4 members - works in various fields such as health care and financial services.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: I almost cried when I saw the Kiva segment on CNN... I have more than I deserve. These people work harder than I, and can hardly feed their children.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a Land Developer in Southwest Florida ( I sell homes in gated communities). I spend all of my free time competing and training as a Triathlete.

lender.name: William Hite
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping hard working people and their families climb out of poverty and helping them realize some of their dreams. I am fortunate to be an American, and would like to share some of my good fortune with others.

lender.name: Kathryn
lender.loan_because: To help
lender.occupational_info: I work at a university, helping environmental scientists manage and spend their grant funds.

lender.name: Gracie
lender.loan_because: I love the feeling I get in my stomach when I give back to someone. Giving is the best present anyone can ever get.

lender.name: Scott and Kimberly
lender.loan_because: it is such a wonderful opportunity to share in personal growth of people all over the world.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: everyone needs a little help at some time in their life. It gives me great pleasure to be able to help--even though the amount may be small.
lender.occupational_info: I worked for many doctors, helping them by writing letters, making appointments, and arranging tests for their patients.

lender.name: Yvonne
lender.loan_because: I believe that a little leg-up, and hard work can result in success and a great sense of accomplishment. Everyone deserves the opportunity to better themselves and their community.

lender.name: Joao
lender.loan_because: it's a small way I can help those with great needs
lender.occupational_info: help physicians treat patients with heart disease

lender.name: Marshall
lender.loan_because: I spent 6 months volunteering in Ecuador and traveled in Peru for two weeks. I feel this is a great way to continue helping people in South America get ahead in life.

lender.name: Eleni
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Mikkel Breum
lender.loan_because: I believe that microfinancing can be much better than traditional aid, as it recognises the recievers as people with pride and motivation, instead of as clients and beggars. Just like you would normally lend your collegues or neighbour instead of giving; for just the same reason. Another important issue for me is, that this way the money is distributed through grassroot organisations, so its harder for corrupt people in power to steal it from the people it was intended for. Finally I believe, that people committing and doing something instead of just talking about it, is the only way for this world to ever get better.

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: I think it is a fantastic way to help others in a personal meaningful way.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a consultant for the insurance industry.

lender.name: Petra
lender.loan_because: it's a phenomenal way to get money to the people who need it most.
lender.occupational_info: I work with electric companies to help keep the lights on!

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: Ican.
lender.occupational_info: Pretending

lender.name: Laurie
lender.loan_because: I appreciate the fact that these people are willing to do what it takes to better their lives and those of their families.
lender.occupational_info: General bookkeeping and income tax preparation. Also sell on Ebay.

lender.name: Kay
lender.loan_because: God has been good to me and I in turn want to give back. That's what its all about. I thank my neice for letting me know about Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital lab. We help the Doctor find out what germ is making you sick and what medication will help make you well.

lender.name: Wayne
lender.loan_because: it is a joy to help someone improve their life

lender.name: Many Blessings
lender.loan_because: We have been very fortunate, the least we can do is help others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a nurse, married to a veterinarian. We have four kids and numerous critters.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: it's an easy way to make a big difference. I especially find it important to support women who are trying to start or expand their businesses because it allows them to be self-reliant.

lender.name: Alice
lender.loan_because: I'm lending this money to derserving people in the name of my grandchildren. Tanner, Jared, Harlie and Brooke, as an extra Hanukkah gift, in hopes it will teach them the value of charity and the thrill that comes from helping other families in need.
lender.occupational_info: I'm best known for the miniature animals I create out of clay, paint, fake fur and/or feathers. They are in private collections and museums. I built this home based business by myself over 30 years ago.

lender.name: victoria
lender.loan_because: I want to support women who want to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I help hospitals reduce cost and improve clinical outcomes.

lender.name: giandomenico
lender.loan_because: i have the possibility and i trust in microcredit as a way for a better world

lender.name: The Skelton Family
lender.loan_because: As a family this year we are making donations instead of exchanging christmas gifts. We hope to spread our gifts around the world this year!

lender.name: Sydney
lender.occupation: Program Director for a public policy nonprofit

lender.name: Forrest
lender.loan_because:
"Give a man a fish and he is fed for a day, teach a man to fish and he is fed for a lifetime, provide credit and training, he opens a seafood stand and feeds a village."
“The significant problems we have cannot be solved at the same level of thinking with which we created them.” - Albert Einstein
lender.occupational_info: I am an engineer working in Washington state, helping clean up the Hanford Nuclear reservation.

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to be able to help.
